itunes:title: Episode 138 - Freedom The F*ck On!
title: Episode 138 - Freedom The F*ck On!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Mat Best sit down for a one on one to break down what it's like to sell a book, the writing process, and the endless notes you go through from agent to publisher. If you were ever curious on what it's like, this episode is for you. Mat...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Mat Best sit down for a one on one to break down what it's like to sell a book, the writing process, and the endless notes you go through from agent to publisher. If you were ever curious on what it's like, this episode is for you. Mat Best: Freedom The F*ck On comes out in bookstores everywhere this fall.

Ross Patterson and Mat Best sit down for a one on one to break down what it's like to sell a book, the writing process, and the endless notes you go through from agent to publisher.
